# paymentCredentialStatus

**Instance Property**

The status of the possible payment credentials that a person has provisioned in Wallet.

## Declaration

```swift
PaymentCredentialStatus paymentCredentialStatus;
```

## Discussion

This object, which [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePaySession/applePayCapabilities] returns, helps you determine when and where to display an Apple Pay button.

The following are possible return values:
title: paymentCredentialStatus
